overview:
He is currently content manager for Thounds.com

Born in Bologna and raised in Treviso, he got a degree in Statistics and Information Technology at the University of Venice in 1998.

His career begins in the mid Nineties as a teenage tour manager, then web developer, later he has been a founder and project manager for Kubera (first Italian Internet CafÃ© network with 300 affiliates the first year), again project manager for a couple of financial portals, chief editor and communication manager for MUG a fashion magazine, Mathematics teacher and international DJ.

He never formed a band and he loves Fawlty Towers.
